summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2428, for the improvement of 6th Avenue South, from Weller Street to Seattle Boulevard, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by replanking the same, by the construction of wooden curbs and gutters, relaying wooden sidewalks, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 25541 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
